title: GitHub invites open-source AI developers to apply for Accelerator
description:
GitHub has announced applications are now open for the next cohort of its Accelerator program, which provides funding, mentoring, and other benefits for early-stage open-source projects. There is a particular focus this year on developers building AI solutions. Applications will be accepted on a rolling basis until 5 March 2024. Ten projects will be selected... Read more »

The post GitHub invites open-source AI developers to apply for Accelerator appeared first on Developer Tech News.
